oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Review: Oswin Köhler, The World of the Khwe Bushmen in Southern Africa: A Self-Portrait in Their Own Language, Berlin, Dietrich Reimer, 2018
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Heine, Bernd
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Review: Oswin Köhler, The World of the Khwe Bushmen in Southern Africa: A Self-Portrait in Their Own Language. Volume 4.1. Historically analyzed and edited by Gertrud Boden, with inter­linear glosses and English translations by Anne-Maria Fehn, and with the assistance of Thaddeus Chedau, Berlin, Dietrich Reimer, 2018
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Journal of Namibian Studies : History Politics Culture; Vol. 25 (2019); 123-124
